title: IOS app development - presenting a pin on a map
snippet:
Hi,

I need to develop a basic mapping application where an app, connects to an API, collects a LAT and LONG and presents it on a map.

Attached is the API Protocol.

At the end of the project I would like support to submit the app
I need all the source code, I am not too bothered what we build it in.
I need all the IP.  You will need to sign an IP agreement.
